alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, southwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 216 PM EDT/116 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Panama City Beach to near Mexico Beach. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Dirego Park, College Station, West Panama City, Overstreet, Bennett and Davis Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty; Washington
